H0.text: The letter t is the second most common letter used in the English language. False

H1.text: The letter t is the second most common letter used in the English language. The letter 'a'

H2.text: The letter t is the second most common letter used in the English language. The letter 'o'

H3.text: The letter t is the second most common letter used in the English language. True

A4.text: According to Lewand, arranged from most to least common in appearance, the letters are: etaoinshrdlcumwfgypbvkjxqz.

A5.text: In English, the space character occurs almost twice as frequently as the top letter (⟨e⟩) and the non-alphabetic characters (digits, punctuation, etc.) collectively occupy the fourth position (having already included the space) between ⟨t⟩ and ⟨a⟩.
